name: Slayer's Presence
summary: Your very presence strikes fear into the undead.
description:
Your very presence strikes fear into the undead. When you use Slayer's Identification and succeed at your check, you can Frighten Undead as a free action, targeting the creature you identified. Any time you get a critical success to Frighten Undead, if the target's level is lower than yours, the target is fleeing for 1 round.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
